serp_composition_analysis.key_finding: SERP is dominated by marketplaces - NO dedicated informational content ranking in top 10. This represents a major content gap opportunity.

pricing_cost.question: Wie viel kostet ein Pferd in Österreich?
pricing_cost.answer_snippet: Für Freizeitreiten liegen die Preise typischerweise zwischen 1.500 € und 10.000 €
pricing_cost.keyword_alignment: pferde kaufen für 200 euro, pferde günstig kaufen

pricing_cost.question: Wie viel kostet es, ein Pferd zu kaufen?
pricing_cost.answer_snippet: Für ein eingerittenes Freizeitpferd sind bis zu 6.000 € fällig. Freizeitpferde für Turniersport kosten ca. 7.000 € bis 25.000 €

pricing_cost.question: Wie teuer ist das billigste Pferd?
pricing_cost.keyword_alignment: pferde kaufen für 200 euro, pferde günstig kaufen

pricing_cost.question: Wie viel kostet ein eigenes Pferd im Monat?
pricing_cost.answer_snippet: Im Durchschnitt mindestens 500 Euro ohne Ausrüstung monatlich

buying_process.question: Kann ich einfach so ein Pferd kaufen?
buying_process.answer_snippet: Du kannst dein Pferd beim Züchter, Händler, von Privat oder beim Schlachter kaufen
buying_process.keyword_alignment: pferde vom schlachter kaufen, landwirt pferde, züchter

buying_process.question: Wie viel Zeit braucht man für ein Pferd?
buying_process.answer_snippet: Stallarbeit ca. 1-1,5 Stunden, Reiten 30 Minuten bis 4 Stunden, durchschnittlich 2-3 Stunden täglich

legal_regulations.question: Wer darf in Österreich Pferde halten?
legal_regulations.answer_snippet: Zulässige Eingriffe dürfen nur durch Tierarzt oder sachkundige Person durchgeführt werden

investment_value.question: Ist der Kauf eines Pferdes eine gute Investition?
investment_value.answer_snippet: Investition in Pferde kann hervorragende Möglichkeit sein, Geld zu verdienen

horse_characteristics.question: Was besagt die 20%-Regel bei Pferden?
horse_characteristics.answer_snippet: Durchschnittliches Reitpferd kann etwa 20 Prozent seines Körpergewichts problemlos tragen

paa_summary.key_insight: Price is DOMINANT buying question (40% of PAA). Buyers want to understand cost before commitment. This is distinct from marketplace research.

content_gaps_identified.opportunity: Create comprehensive buying guide that educates before conversion
content_gaps_identified.reasoning: All top 10 are marketplaces/directories. Users seeking guidance will find marketplaces instead of educational content. Information-focused content would fill major gap.

content_gaps_identified.gap: No pricing guide specific to Austria
content_gaps_identified.opportunity: Create detailed price guide with regional breakdown (Tirol, Kärnten, Steiermark, etc.)
content_gaps_identified.keywords_addressed: pferde kaufen für 200 euro, pferde günstig kaufen, price-related PAA
content_gaps_identified.reasoning: 40% of PAA questions are pricing-related. Price guides rank well in Google and answer dominant user intent.

content_gaps_identified.opportunity: Step-by-step buying guide covering: sources, inspection, negotiation, contracts, registration
content_gaps_identified.reasoning: PAA shows 'Kann ich einfach so ein Pferd kaufen?' indicates process confusion. Opportunity for comprehensive guide.

content_gaps_identified.gap: No buying source comparison (marketplace vs farmers vs breeders vs rescue)
content_gaps_identified.opportunity: Create 'where to buy' guide comparing Willhaben vs ehorses vs Landwirt vs breeders vs rescue
content_gaps_identified.keywords_addressed: willhaben pferde (6600 SV), landwirt pferde (3600 SV), pferdezucht
content_gaps_identified.reasoning: Navigational keywords (willhaben, landwirt) show users want marketplace guidance. Comparative content would serve this intent while providing value.

content_gaps_identified.opportunity: Create guide on Austrian horse ownership requirements, regulations by state (Niederösterreich, Steiermark, etc.)
content_gaps_identified.reasoning: PAA shows legal question: 'Wer darf in Österreich Pferde halten?' Government sources ranking for this, opportunity to provide more comprehensive guide.

content_gaps_identified.opportunity: Create Austrian breed guides (Noriker 2400 SV, Haflinger 1300 SV) with buying tips
content_gaps_identified.reasoning: Phase 1 analysis shows breed keywords have highest volume. ehorses has category pages but no informational guides. Opportunity for content authority.

content_gaps_identified.gap: No TCO (Total Cost of Ownership) guide
content_gaps_identified.opportunity: Create comprehensive TCO guide covering: purchase price, stabling, feed, vet, insurance, equipment
content_gaps_identified.reasoning: PAA shows monthly cost question (500€+). Buyers need to understand full financial commitment before purchase.

content_gaps_identified.opportunity: Create regional buying guides for high-volume states (Tirol +23%, Kärnten +50%, Steiermark)
content_gaps_identified.keywords_addressed: pferd kaufen tirol, pferd kaufen kärnten, pferd kaufen steiermark
content_gaps_identified.reasoning: Phase 1 shows Tirol/Kärnten have growth trends. Regional guides could capture local searches while building regional authority.

content_gaps_identified.opportunity: Create guide for budget-conscious buyers (under 1000€, rescue angles)
content_gaps_identified.keywords_addressed: pferde kaufen für 200 euro, pferde günstig kaufen, pferde vom schlachter
content_gaps_identified.reasoning: Budget keywords show high CPC (0.61), indicating commercial value. PAA shows cheapest horse interest. Budget buyer segment underserved.

ehorses_dominance_analysis.key_finding: ehorses demonstrates strong domain authority and internal linking strategy. Their regional pages (Steiermark, Salzburg) rank in top 10, showing category-based regional SEO approach.
ehorses_dominance_analysis.competitive_implication: To compete, pferdewert.de should: 1) Create comprehensive informational content (not available in top 10), 2) Develop regional guides with strong internal linking, 3) Target long-tail keyword variations that marketplaces don't optimize for

navigational.user_intent: Find specific marketplace or breeding association

informational.user_intent: Learn about buying process, prices, requirements before purchase

search_intent_distribution.insight: SERP underserves informational intent (only 10%) despite PAA showing 40% pricing questions. This is the content gap opportunity.

quick_wins.rationale: 40% of PAA is pricing-focused. No pricing guide ranks in top 10.
Government sources ranking but sparse. Opportunity for more comprehensive guide.
No guide comparing ehorses, Willhaben, Landwirt, BillyRider exists. Navigational keywords (6600+3600 SV) show demand.
quick_wins.estimated_impact: High - answers navigational intent with value add

medium_term_strategy: Develop regional guides for Tirol (+23%), Kärnten (+50%), Steiermark following ehorses' regional category approach
Create breed-specific buyer guides (Noriker 2400 SV, Haflinger 1300 SV) with purchasing tips beyond ehorses category listings
Build comprehensive 'how to buy' step-by-step guide addressing process confusion evident in PAA
actionable_recommendations.seo_positioning: Pferdewert.de should position as 'the Austrian horse buyer's educational resource' - the informational content that actually helps buyers understand the market before they visit marketplaces. This is the void in the top 10.
